title: onOne Perfect Photo Suite 9.5.0.1644 Premium Edition
description:
onOne Perfect Photo Suite 9 - a set of powerful applications of well-known company onOne Software, presented in a single package. Includes 7 standalone programs and plug-ins for Adobe Photoshop. It is designed for professional and advanced photographers and photography enthusiasts, who will provide intuitive tools for applying photographic effects, portrait retouching, creating and editing multi-layer image, replacing unwanted backgrounds, image resizing, color depth, sharpness, adding effects, borders and more . The new version allows you to solve basic problems in digital photography, offering photographers to fully realize their creative abilities. Installing the Perfect Photo Suite 9, you will become closer to the realization of their creative interests and fantasies.

Features :

Perfect B & W 9 - offers photographers of all levels, the easiest way to create stunning black-and-white image. Its powerful and intuitive tools offer instant results, as well as full creative control over the process and methods of treatment. Perfect Effects 9 - Receiver popular PhotoTools - includes a complete library of professional photographic effects with a vast range, designed by Jack Davis and Kevin Kubota have universal application . It allows processing in batch mode, regardless of the format and size of images, add watermark, apply multiple effects simultaneously, and many others The treatment can be done in automatic and manual modes can be previewed. Perfect Portrait 9 offers the latest innovations in portrait retouching. Photographers can now focus on the art of creating portraits with less time-consuming because the program automatically finds features in the images and makes retouching, improves skin texture and color, removes defects, stresses the important details such as eyes, lips, teeth, etc. .. Perfect Layers 9 provide unlimited creative possibilities for photographers and photos in the pool will allow you to create and edit multi-layered files directly into Lightroom or a standalone application. Perfect Layers files are saved in PSD format and can be edited in Photoshop and Photoshop Elements. Perfect Mask 9 - The leading software for background replacement separation from the main image. The designer a given set of 12 intuitive and convenient tool for masking objects. The technology used allows you to create unique circuits (masks), consisting of a large number of control points and thus keep colors as accurate and clean the edges of various objects, from largest to smallest, and fine details such as hair, smoke, glass ... Perfect Resize 9 - a new generation of Genuine Fractals, adds new features to achieve the fineness of detail in the image is enlarged, and the availability of an improved interface simplifies the user experience. This application can be used directly in Adobe Photoshop, Lightroom and Apple Aperture without the need for a separate download. Perfect Enhance 9 - new module provides the necessary tools for basic improvements, where you can adjust brightness and contrast, remove color cast, add the field and vignette and more more. This is the perfect module when you use the Perfect Photo Suite 9 as a standalone application to quickly edit your photo or image.

System Requirements :

Windows 7 or Windows 8 (current maintenance releases, only 64 bit)

Intel Core 2 Duo, Xeon or better processors (s)

8 GB RAM

1.5 GB Hard Drive for installation

OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card with 256 MB dedicated video RAM, 1280x720 resolution (OpenGL 4.0 compatible video card with 1GB dedicated video RAM, 1920x1080 resolution is recommended)

Adobe Photoshop CS6, CC, or CC 2014

Adobe Photoshop Elements 11, 12, or 13

Adobe Photoshop Lightroom 4 or 5
